"Daily/Weekly Tasks":
"Daily Tasks are tasks that are available every day. Weekly Tasks are tasks that are available every week.

Daily Tasks update every day at 19:00, while Weekly Tasks update every week at Wed 2:00"

"Daily Tasks are tasks that are available every day. Weekly Tasks are tasks that are available every week.

Daily Tasks update every day at 12:00, while Weekly Tasks update every week at Wed 2:00"

"デイリータスクやウィークリータスクの内容は、
任意のクラスレベルを上限まで上げた時など、
ゲームの進行状況によって、変化する場合があります。"

"Each account can only complete each Daily Task once per day and each Weekly Task once per week. Progress cannot be carried over to the next day or next week.

In addition to regular Tasks, there may be special Tasks that are only available for a limited time."
